document_data.name: ''Snaketongue Amulet''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Snaketongue amulets''''' were [[enchanted]] [[amulet]]s and ''[[holy symbol]]'' worn by members of the [[Snaketongue cult]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Powers: These amulets, shaped like ''holy symbols'' of some strange new religion, possessed magics that protected the wearer from [[poison]]s, allowing them a higher chance to remain unaffected or shake the effects of poisons quicker.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, a ''snaketongue amulet'' was worn by Overlord [[Flamespar]] who attacked the [[Mines of Selgol]] in [[Samarach]] on behalf of the Snaketongue cult. Eventually, more agents and assassins of the mysterious organization that worshiped an interloper deity [[Zehir]] started appearing in the [[Sword Coast North]] and Samarach, attempting to undermine mercantile activities of merchant [[Sa'Sani]] and a group of her mercenaries turned business partners.
